RATM - Bulls on Parade

  epsi  
   
 nu metal  90s  

Weapons, not food, not homes, not shoes
Not need, just feed the war cannibal animal

Terminal Dofiles.

  • While arms warehouses fill as quick as the cells

  • Rally round tha family, pocket full of shells

Example Dotfiles

ViM RC: bandithijo
